actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-498.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 146) to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the preservation of historic Camden in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 146 (Historic preservation of Camden, South Carolina).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 146) to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the preservation of historic Camden in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.
